name: dendra-json-schema
description: JSON Schema files for the Dendra data platform.
author: J. Scott Smith <scott@newleafsolutionsinc.com>

scripts.test: npm run test-schemas && npm run test-extended
scripts.test-extended: for s in schemas/draft-07-latest/extended/*.json; do ajv compile -s "$s" --strict=false; done
scripts.test-schemas: for d in test/*.json; do s=${d#*.}; ajv test -s "schemas/draft-07-latest/$s" -r schemas/draft-07-latest/types.json -d "$d" --valid --strict=false --validate-formats=false; done
